name: Still Sol
description:
Summary:

Still Sol is a short, first person platforming game. The movement system is simple , the player can double jump and wall jump, but a wall jump will reset the double jump. You will use this system to get through a chain of short challenges. It should take around 15 - 30 minutes to complete, depending on how good you are with this type of game. Feel free to post any bugs you encounter and enjoy the game!

Controls:

WASD = Movement

Mouse = Look

Space = Jump/Wall Jump
